abstract: The New York law firm Cravath, Swaine & Moore has elected C. Allen Parker as its next chief, succeeding Evan R. Chesler, who will become chairman.
snippet: The New York law firm Cravath, Swaine & Moore has elected C. Allen Parker as its next chief, succeeding Evan R. Chesler, who will become chairman.
lead_paragraph: The New York law firm Cravath, Swaine & Moore announced on Thursday that it had elected C. Allen Parker as its next chief, succeeding Evan R. Chesler, who will become chairman.
